callBet(bytes32,uint256).details: Function to call the winner of a bet. Only callable by bookie.

fundBet(bytes32).details: fundBet function for a bookie only to add some liquidity to a bet. People need money to win at the start

getOdds(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: getOdds somewhat confusingly actually returns the payout amount, not the odds

params._amount: is the amount to bet. Your odds depend on this
params._option: is the option index to bet on

placeBet(bytes32,uint256).details: function to place a bet. Anyone can call on any book as long as the option is included in the book

params._option: is the option to bet on

settleBet(uint256).details: function to collect on a won bet

params.ticket: is the NFT id to turn in for the winnings

userdoc.notice: A contract for betting complete with a bookies reduction rate. The contract can issue "books" of bets which their bookies profit off of. And users can bet on. The ID of a book is emited as an event and a bet ticket is issued as an NFT with incremental interger IDs
